Module.Content:
<script type="text/javascript" src="http://srcdemo2.googlecode.com/git-history/googlecode-wiki-vimeo/vimeo.js"></script>
 <script>
 function start() {
   gcVideoMain('__UP_video__', gadgets.flash.embedFlash, 
               document.getElementById('video'));
 }
 gadgets.util.registerOnLoadHandler(start);
 </script>
 <div id="video"/>
